response: narrative=Chloe Sanders was last seen by her sister before she boarded a bus heading toward 224-226 Archerhill Road, Glasgow. She was expected to meet her friend, Trevor Smith, but never arrived at the intended location. Her last known address was near the 55 Diana Avenue, Glasgow. Trevor, worried after Chloe failed to join him, checked the nearby skate park and her part-time job but found no trace of her. The search expanded to the surrounding roadhouse and areas Chloe often visited. Eventually, Chloe was located on a cruise ship docked at Acre Drive, Glasgow. A member of the public found her and reported it to the authorities, leading to her safe return. Despite the high initial risk level, Chloe was unharmed and reunited with her family.

narrative=Chloe Sanders, recently discharged from a care facility, was last seen acting erratically near a cruise ship at 21 Rampart Avenue, Glasgow. Her grandfather feared abduction as her vehicle was found at Belsyde Avenue.

narrative=Chloe Sanders, a 13-year-old girl, went missing from her home at 52a Sinclair Street, Helensburgh. She had recently been released from a care facility and from prison, which had caused some tension at home. Chloe's aunt noticed her absence and contacted the police, concerned for her niece's safety. Several people, including her uncle and Samantha Evans, reported seeing her near Belsyde Avenue, where it's believed she was trying to avoid attention. Chloe was eventually traced by the police at 1a The Auld Road. Though initially a medium risk case, she was found safe, leading to a reassessment to a low-risk status.
narrative=Chloe Sanders was last seen at school, prompting abduction suspicions. She was located after police traced signals near her grandfather's home.
narrative=Chloe Sanders was last seen acting erratically at a playground with Lucy Sanders.
narrative=Chloe Sanders, recently discharged from a care facility, was suspected abducted after missing work without contact. Her father reported last seeing the vehicle near 52a Sinclair Street.

narrative=Chloe Sanders, recently released from prison and noted to act erratically, missed work with no contact. Last seen by her brother near the youth center, raising concerns about her whereabouts. She was later found safe by police.
